# subscript(_:_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Retrieves a column with the specified name and type.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript<T>(columnName: String, columnType: T.Type) -> MLDataColumn<T>? where T : MLDataValueConvertible { get }
```

## Parameters

- **columnName**: The name of the column to extract.
- **columnType**: The underlying type of the columnâ€™s content.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataColumn] with the specified name and type, if it exists; otherwise `nil`.

## Overview

Use this subscript to get a typed [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataColumn], which is easier to work with than a [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLUntypedColumn] returned from [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataTable/subscript(_:)-3wjk].

## Accessing columns

- **subscript(_:)**: Retrieves or adds an untyped column with the specified name.
